page.name: Beach Vacation Invasion!
page.description: All you wanted to do was build some sand castles *sigh*. Fiery light monsters have overrun Falconreach beach and they are ruining everyone's good time. Enough is Enough!

properties.name: Beach Vacation Invasion!
properties.description: All you wanted to do was build some sand castles *sigh*. Fiery light monsters have overrun Falconreach beach and they are ruining everyone's good time. Enough is Enough!
properties.complete: You've cleared this small section of the beach but the temperature is rising and the beach monsters are giving everyone sunburns! Clear the rest of the beach so that people can enjoy their break!

page.name: Time Travel Fairy Ticketstub
page.description: A wrinkle in time let you travel back to historical DragonFable wars.  Once you return to your time, you find yourself clutching a battered gold ticketstub which reads "Time Travel Fairy Tours, Assistant Agent Rose thanks you for your time!"
